verses.content: Aw Israelhai vêngtu, Berâm pâwl anga Josefhai ṭhuoitu, na lo sit rawh aw; Nang cherubhai chunga ṭhung chu, hung var suok rawh.
Ephraimhai le, Benjaminhai le, Manassehai mithmua chun i hrâtna kha chawktho la, Keini mi sandam dingin hung rawh.
Aw Pathien, mîn nghatkîrtir nâwk la; I hmêl kha sukvar la; chuong- chun, sandamin um kan tih.
Aw LALPA, sipaihai Pathien, Ieng chen am i mihai ṭawngṭâina chunga hin i lunginsen ding a na?
Anni chu mitthli beiin i châwm a, Mitthli hi dâwn dingin inkhina lientakin i pêk hlak.
Nangin kan vêla mihai ta dinga insêlnaah i mi siem hlak a, A mi dotuhai chu an innui tâwl hlak.
Aw sipaihai Pathien, mîn nghatkîrtir nâwk la, I hmêl kha sukvar la, chuongchun, sandamin kan um ding annâwm.
Aigupta rama inthawka grêphrui i hung lâk a, Hnam tin chu i hnawt dawk a, i phun tah a;
A hma i sukfai pei a, Inthûktakin zung a kei a, ram chu a aw ta vawng a.
Tlânghai chu a hlim tuomin an um tâwl a, A kâuhai chu Pathien sidar thinghai ang el a nih,
A kâuhai chu tuisuoriet chenin ân zâm suoktir a, A dâwn inderhai chu Vadungpui chenin.
Iengdinga a palhai chu i suksiet am a na? Lama fe taphawtin an kei thlâk ta hi.
Ramhnuoia sanghal chun a suksiet a, Ram sahai khawmin an tlân hlak.
Aw sipaihai Pathien, lungin- siettakin nghakîr nâwk ta; Vâna inthawk khan zuk en la, hi grêp hrui hi en la, hung kan rawh.
A kûng i kut changtiengin a phun le, A kâu i ta dinga i sukhrât le hin.
Meiah a kâng tah a, phûrin a um tah a; I hmêla halna leiin an bohmang hlak.
I kut kha i ditsak mi chungah um raw se, Mihriem naupa i ta dinga i sukhrât chunga hin.
Chuongchun, kîr san naw ning ung cheh a, Mi sukhar la; chuongchun, i hming lam kan tih.
Aw LALPA, sipaihai Pathien, mîn nghatkîrtir nâwk la. I hmêl kha sukvar la, chuongchun, sandamin um kan tih.
